ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Computer Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Would Sygate work for 5 computers to share a satellite connection that has to be connected directly to a computer via usb port and run the ISPs software? I
ygData.messageBody:
Would Sygate work for 5 computers to share a satellite connection that has
to be connected directly to a computer via usb port and run the ISPs
software? I used Windows Network Setup Wizard to establish my network. It
leaves much to be desired. The computers all run WinXP Home edition.
luv,
-Su


> Yes. I have 5 on a single connection, myself. One is directly connected to
> the DSL, and runs a program called Sygate which shares the connection to
the
> other machines. It has a special configuration package for EQ, but worked
> fine without it, for me, so try working without it first. If you have any
> trouble with it, email me, it has a few rare but known issues that can be
> hard to diagnose but are pretty easy to fix.
